TEXT.TITLE: THAILAND EXPECTS SMALLER SUGARCANE OUTPUT
TEXT.BODY: Thailand's sugarcane output will fall to about 23.55 mln tonnes in the 1986/87 (November-October) season from 24.09 mln in 1985/86, the Agriculture Ministry said. It said a January survey put the total area under sugarcane at 545,528 hectares, down from 556,860 hectares the previous year. The national average yield is expected to fall to 43.17 tonnes/hectare from 43.22 tonnes in 1985/86, it said. REUTER
